name: todo-app
description: Full-stack Todo application with Next.js and NestJS

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev && npx ts-node prisma/seed.ts
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset --force && npx ts-node prisma/seed.ts
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
